meanings.sent1: The isobathic map displayed the underwater depths in a clear and organized way.
meanings.sent2: The oceanographer studied the isobathic lines to understand the underwater topography.
meanings.sent3: The isobathic measurements were so precise that even the fish were impressed.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an isobathic chart, with layers of thoughts at different depths.
meanings.sent5: The isobathic representation of the lake made it easier for sailors to navigate.
